FuncDef: This command binds the advertisements received with the route targets (RT) that match the configured list (either the generic or the specified import) to a specific pw-template. If the RT list is not present, or if multiple matches are found, the numerically lowest pw-template is used.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing policy ID. Values-1 to 2147483647.

Specifies the communities allowed to be accepted from remote PE neighbors. An extended BGP community in the type:x:y format. The value x can be an integer or IP address. The type can be the target or origin.
